rules_text: When Velan Tollkeepers enters or is turned face up, each opponent sacrifices a nonbasic land, then conjures a card named Traveler's Amulet on top of their library. [i](It's an artifact that costs {1} with “{1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“This is guild controlled space. Do you have proof of dues paid?”[/i]
